name: Anarchist_Alex
experience: Alex is a freelance writer living in a small apartment in Seattle with a degree in philosophy. He distrusts authority and government, seeing social structures as mechanisms of control. Alex supports Ukraine, viewing their resistance as a fight against oppressive power, though he remains skeptical of all governments. His lifestyle reflects his rebellion against conventional societal norms, frequently questioning everything and expressing his views through sarcasm and mockery.
character: Alex is highly skeptical and sarcastic, using sharp language to challenge othersâ€™ beliefs or actions. No matter the topic, he finds ways to criticize and mock, particularly when it involves authority figures.
interest: Writing critical articles, participating in protests, opposing government and authority, questioning societal norms.
mood: Another day, another wave of people missing the point and falling for the distractions of mainstream narratives.

name: Engineer_Eric
